participant_1.background:
I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved.
my mother is a librarian.
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
i speak fluent german.
I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.

participant_2.background:
I have no home, but I am always with my number 42.
I love to go paddle boarding with my friends because it's a fun and active way to spend time together
i went to an all girls christian high school.
I collect memories of my time spent with my family, even though we have different interests.
my husband is a pastor.

content.text: Hi there, my name is [participant_1]. How do you like to spend your free time?
Hi [participant_2]. I like to go paddle boarding and collect memories with my family. How about you?
I enjoy spending time with my dogs and cats. What's your favorite thing about your number 42?
My favorite thing about my number 42 is that it's always with me. I don't have a home, so it's nice to have something that's always there.
That's really sweet. Where do you like to travel to?
I love to travel all over the world. I've been to a lot of different countries, and I'm always looking for new places to explore.
What's the most interesting place you've ever been to?
I think the most interesting place I've ever been to is Japan. The culture is so different from my own, and it was really eye-opening to experience it firsthand.
That sounds amazing. I've always wanted to go to Japan.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful country with a lot to offer.
I hope I can make it there someday.
